ModMetaData.description: Сборка модов с моими правками. - Static Quality Plus 1.0 by ZLJ - Where's the gravel? by Faeldray - Stack XXL by Indeed - Mercer's Backpacks and Nano Suit by Mercer - DeadMansClothing by Hatti - No Death Cooties On Armour by cucumpear
